title: "efficacyAI Signs Exclusive Software License for MedicascyAI™ a Suite of Deep Learning Algorithms Used to Predict Drug Safety and Efficacy"
excerpt: "Georgia Tech Research Corporation granting it exclusive rights to the use of a suite of algorithms called MedicascyAI. This novel artificial intelligence software platform requires only the chemical structure of a small molecule as the input to make actionable high confidence predictions related to the safety and efficacy of the molecule’s use for targeted indications."
